description.en: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.ar: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.br: O Manto do Dragão Sangrento Todo-Poderoso.
description.de: Der Umhang des allmächtigen Blood Dragon Sets. Kombiniere ihn mit dem vollständigen Kostümset und erhalte erstaunliche Boni! Trage zusätzlich die Maske für noch mehr Macht!
description.fi: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.fil: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.fr: Cape du set du Dragon Sanguinaire Immortel. Accorde de fantastiques bonus une fois combinée au set complet ! Portez le masque pour encore plus de puissance !
description.id: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Mengenakan ini dengan set kostum lengkap memberikan bonus luar biasa! Kenakan topeng untuk kekuatan yang lebih besar!
description.it: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.jp: 破壊のブラッドドラゴンセットのマント。ファッションのセットと一緒に着用すると最強！マスクをつけてさらにパワーアップできます！
description.kr: 전능하신 피의 드래곤 세트 망토입니다. 이것을 전체 의상 세트로 입으면 놀라운 보너스를 줍니다! 더 강해지려면 마스크를 쓰세요!
description.nl: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.pl: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.ru: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.sp: La Capa del Conjunto Dragón Sanguinario Todopoderoso. ¡Usar esto con el conjunto completo te otorgará bonificaciones increíbles! ¡Usa la máscara para obtener aún más poder!
description.sw: The Cloak of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Wear the mask for even more power!
description.th: ชุดเสื้อคลุมของมังกรโลหิตผู้ทรงอำนาจ การสวมชุดนี้พร้อมกับชุดคอสตูมเต็มรูปแบบจะมอบโบนัสที่น่าทึ่ง! สวมหน้ากากเพื่อเพิ่มพลัง!
description.tw: 破壞的血龍套裝的披風。將其與全套服裝搭配使用可獲得驚人的加乘效果！戴上面具可獲得更大的力量！
description.vi: Áo Choàng Bộ Huyết Long Toàn Năng. Mặc cái này với bộ trang phục đầy đủ sẽ mang lại những khoản tiền thưởng đáng kinh ngạc! Đeo mặt nạ để có thêm sức mạnh!
